desc_graph_function: When enabled, the specified model will be used to extract entities and relationships from knowledge.
msg_graph_llm_dependency: Knowledge graph generation relies on LLM capabilities
warning_token_consumption: This may result in significant token consumption
desc_graph_capability: . Knowledge graphs excel at precise entity-relationship reasoning and logical validation (e.g., querying discount plans for product X), but have limited support for unstructured text and semantically ambiguous queries. We recommend prioritizing vector search and using knowledge graphs only when vector retrieval alone is insufficient.
